featured.text: A country is said to have a comparative advantage over another when it can produce a commodity more cheaply.

definition.zh_def: 比較的，涉及兩個或多個事物之間的比較。
definition.en_def: Relating to or based on comparison; often used to describe the degree of difference between two or more items.
definition.example: In comparative studies, researchers analyze the differences between two groups.
